virtual-sensor.name: Thur_Dozer_NodeHealth__chart4
virtual-sensor.description: backlog health status at Thur deployment

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, GENERATION_TIME, SDIVOLTAGE from Thur_Dozer_NodeHealth__conv__1950

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 1, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p1, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 2, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p2, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 3, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p3, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 4, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p4, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 5, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p5, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 6, SDIVOLTAGE, null) as p6 from wrapper where GENERATION_TIME >= (DATEDIFF(second, '1970-01-01', NOW()) * 1000) - 604800000
